Namespace vsip::impl::lvalue_detail

-Class templates
template <typename T, typename V>
struct Modify_operators

-

A mix-in template which provides +=, -=, *=, /= operators for any class T that defines T::value_type, conversion to T::value_type, and conversion or assignment from T::value_type.

More...

A mix-in template which provides +=, -=, *=, /= operators for any class T that defines T::value_type, conversion to T::value_type, and conversion or assignment from T::value_type. Note that in most uses, T::value_type will have to be given explicitly as the second template argument.
